TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, I see nothing. Zero.

I wish that KSP allowed for better crane building.

 

Edited April 23, 2022 by Ben J. Kerman
Hey schau neue Seite

Granted. All of the crane parts are Kitachi branded.

 

I wish that it was easier to make KSP mods without losing 99% of your sanity and having 17,590,120,312 brain cells go on annual leave.

Granted. You just make a new folder. 

I wish better visual.

Granted. Here you go.

I wish Borland didn't disappear so stupidly.

Granted. You disappear. 

I wish I can cloak.

Granted. But you didn't wish to be able to uncloak, so you stay outside of the material world.

I wish I could travel across the astral planes of my city.

granted but you can't come back from those astral planes

I wish they all of my wishes are no longer corrupted along with this wish cannot be corrupted in any way shape or form wish will mean exactly how I wish it and all of my wishes will aswell

Edited April 24, 2022 by tremonthedgehog

Granted. This thread becomes boring for you.

I wish that mobile cranes weren't insanely expensive.

Granted, but now they are extremely small.

I wish to be able to play KSP forever but no time would pass in the real world without harming anyone mentally or physically in any way.
(Doubles that).

Granted. But you forgot to wish that you can move. 

I wish the destroy of the human civilization.

Granted. You get imprisoned on the island with no civilization on it. Only destroyed ruins of a XVII cent. colonial admistration to make you unsuccessfully search for something useful.

I wish you have a compass. (Idk, what will you do with it on the island 200 meters wide.)

Granted. But I throw it into a lava pool. 

I wish I can have infinite SCP-500.

Granted.
Now you have no time to sleep, as everyone is asking for it 24/7.
At the same time, you can neither hide, as they will get you everywhere, nor hire a salesman because he can steal it.

I wish SCP was more known.

Granted. But MTF Gamma-05 Red Herrings noticed that and erase everything. 

I wish MTF Omega-7 Pandora's box is existing.

Granted. But Omega Doom comes and destroys it.

I wish it was a series.

No. 

I wish I can poke the bear.

Granted.

I wish they will bring a new @Abel101126 instead of the previous one, poking the bear.

Granted. This is the 15454584676646th clone of @Abel101126. 

I wish I am O5-1

Granted.
SCP-45634 "Megalomania Seducing Machine"
Makes every D-staff think they are O5-1. Before eating.

I wish for SCP knowledge exam in every school.

Granted. The question is like "What is O5? "

I wish I am SCP-173 and is invincible.

Granted. The last thing you did in your life was to blink while looking at mirror.

I wish, they were fist describing the SCP object and only after that continued with its contaiment conditions.

Granted: But SCP turned into a PCS and they had to call the CPS.

I wish I understood any of that.

Granted.
The SCP-42587 "Universal Universe Understander" helps you to understand both PCS and CPS by the price of your sanity (as it was written in its instruction.)

I wish for as many SCP objects in KSP as possible.
Actually, I wish for KSP: SCP edition.

Spoiler

Because who knows, maybe you are not joking.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SCP_Foundation

https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com

https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-series
Granted. SCP-2399 has appeared in Jool’s atmosphere and is currently rebuilding itself.
